short_summary: this is request for bid to procure davinci resolve color grading system equivalent
description: Electronic submission details available on P2P portal, please register to access
full_summary:
# Davinci Resolve Color Grading System for Libraries and Archives Canada

## Tender Information

- **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00024752:T
- **Solicitation Number**: BPM020251/24752
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFQ)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
- **Business Type**: Mandatory

## Bid Submission

Bidders must submit their proposals electronically through the Shared Services Canada (SSC) Partnered Procurement Portal (P2P). The bid submission deadline is January 22, 2024.

## Registration

To participate in this solicitation, bidders must first register in the SSC P2P portal. This will provide access to view the solicitation, submit a response, and receive updates and amendments.

## Contact Information

* Company Name: Shared Services Canada
* Contact Name: Javier Ventura
* Contact Email: [None]
* Contact Phone: 343-576-9329
* Contact Fax: 343-576-9329
* Contact Address: 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1P 1B6

## Documents

A link to the solicitation documents is available through the SSC P2P portal: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/C8E675C6-A0F7-4CE8-99C0-9FCBA49050D7](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/C8E675C6-A0F7-4CE8-99C0-9FCBA49050D7)

## Key Dates

* Amended Notice Date: December 11, 2021
* Solicitation Closing Date: January 22, 2024
* Notice Type: Expiré
